properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Storm Warning issued January 15 at 7:50AM PST until January 15 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 35 to 40 kt with gusts to 50 kt, becoming
south 35 to 45 kt with gusts to 55 kt this afternoon and
evening. Combined seas building to 18 to 23 ft at 16 seconds
this afternoon.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM.

* WHEN...Until 9 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should remain in port, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST THIS EVENING
